se.hig.exte.restcontroller

Class GlobalExceptionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.hig.exte.restcontroller.GlobalExceptionHandler

  • @ControllerAdvice
public class GlobalExceptionHandler
extends Object
    Global Exception handler for the application. All Exceptions generated in response to an HTTP call will be returned as an error. If the error is not explicitly handled, an error with status 500 - Internal Server Error will be returned.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String CONSTRAINT_VIOLATION
      The error message used when the error handler catches an ConstraintViolationException.

      The error message used when the error handler catches an MethodArgumentNotValidException.

      The error message used when the error handler catches an IllegalAccessException.
      static String MAX_UPLOAD_SIZE_EXCEEDED
      The error message used when the error handler catches an MaxUploadSizeExceededException.
      static String MULTIPART
      The error message used when the error handler catches an MultipartException.

    • Method Detail

      • handleException

        @ExceptionHandler(value={org.springframework.web.bind.MethodArgumentNotValidException.class,org.springframework.web.multipart.MaxUploadSizeExceededException.class,org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartException.class,org.springframework.dao.DataIntegrityViolationException.class,javax.validation.ConstraintViolationException.class,java.lang.IllegalAccessException.class})
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ApiError> handleException(Exception e,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   org.springframework.web.context.request.WebRequest request)
        This method handles all Exceptions thrown in response to an HTTP call. Exceptions that are not explicitly handled will return a ResponseEntity with status code 500 and the default Exception message.
        Parameters:
        e - The caught Exception.
        request - The incoming web request.
        Returns:
        A ResponseEntity containing an ApiError object.
